column18: 09/24/2015: An assailant threw an incendiary device at a refugee reception center in Keltakangas town, Kymenlaakso region, Finland. There were no reported casualties in the attack. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column64: The specific motive is unknown; however, sources suspected that the attack was part of a larger trend of violence against refugees in Europe.
column97: A petrol bomb was used in the attack.
column108: A building was damaged in this attack.
